body:
You can rename an existing test by clicking on the pen icon beside the test name.

Once you have completed changing the test name, save it by clicking on the green tick icon. Or you can choose not to save it by clicking on the close icon.

You can also change the name from General settings from the settings tab.

  • Navigate to Tests and select the required Test.
  • Click on the Settings tab. 
  • On the General Settings page, modify the name in the Test Name field.
Renaming a Test
  • Click on the Save Changes button.
The test name is changed

 Note: We recommend you to not change the name of an ongoing Test.
title: How to Rename a Test
